column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Houston's ramen game is basically over now that Jinya is in town. At first I was disappointed at how far down south their first location was. Clear Lake was an insane drive from any part of Houston. But when they opened a second shop in Midtown
column2: the location was perfect. Not too much traffic on the corner of Louisiana and Elgin
column3: but pretty busy with pedestrians with all the trendy looking restaurants and shops next door. They even have a convenient parking garage attached to the building.
